DOC.brief_summary: Cesarean Myomectomy, safety and effect on uterine cavity.
DOC.detailed_description: this study aims to compare between women who underwent Cesarean Myomectomy and those who underwent Cesarean section only regarding the procedure safety and whether uterine cavity was affected later on.
DOC.criteria: pregnant full term had uterine myoma history of coagulation disorder antepartum hemorrhage previous myomectomy where additional operative procedures were performed
